name: Bandorban
description: Bandarban is a district in South-Eastern Bangladesh, and a part of the Chittagong Division.

name: Sajek
description: Sajek Tripuri Valley is one of the most popular tourist spots in Bangladesh.

name: Bhatiari
description: Bhatiari is a place situated at Bhatiari Union in Sitakunda, Chittagong.

name: Rangamati
description: Rangamati is the administrative headquarter and town of Rangamati Hill District in the Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a city, fishing port, tourism centre, and district headquarters in south eastern near Chattogram Bangladesh.

name: Saint Martin
description: St. Martin's Island is a small island (area only 3 km2) in the northeastern part of the Bay of Bengal.
